name: onehourstudy
description: OneHourStudy - Connecting Students with Expert Tutors

scripts.seo:check-all: lighthouse http://localhost:3000 --only-categories=seo --output=html --output-path=./seo-report.html && lighthouse http://localhost:3000/student-register --only-categories=seo --output=html --output-path=./seo-report-student.html && lighthouse http://localhost:3000/teacher-register --only-categories=seo --output=html --output-path=./seo-report-teacher.html && lighthouse http://localhost:3000/pricing --only-categories=seo --output=html --output-path=./seo-report-pricing.html && lighthouse http://localhost:3000/faq --only-categories=seo --output=html --output-path=./seo-report-faq.html && lighthouse http://localhost:3000/contact --only-categories=seo --output=html --output-path=./seo-report-contact.html
